search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Humanitix (humanitix.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official URL for the pricing page of Humanitix: [https://www.humanitix.com/](https://www.humanitix.com/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing for Humanitix Event Ticketing Platform | Humanitix

extracted_content.content:
Pricing for Humanitix Event Ticketing Platform | Humanitix
===============

$10,000,000

given back to humanity

[Host logins](https://console.humanitix.com/login)

$10,000,000+

donated back to humanity

We’re transforming ticket booking fees from a necessary evil into a powerful force for good. 100% of Humanitix’s profits are dedicated to charities providing life’s essentials to humans worldwide: healthcare, education, food, and stability.

[Impact Report 2024](https://humanitix.com/reports/nov2024)

[Home](https://humanitix.com/us)

[Find events](https://humanitix.com/us)[Host events](https://humanitix.com/us/for-hosts)

Low fees, high impact
=====================

##### With no subscription fees, low ticket fees and 100% of profits going to charity, switching to Humanitix is win-win-win!

[Book a demo](https://go.humanitix.com/request-a-demo)[Get started free](https://humanitix.com/us/sign-up)

![Image 4: A girl](https://humanitix.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpricing-home-girl-2%403x.24f7b94a.jpeg&w=1920&q=75)

##### Free events

#### $Nothing. Nada.

zero.

##### Standard

#### 2.1% + $0.99

Per paid ticket

payment processing: **2.9% + $0.30**

##### Charities & Schools

#### 1% + $0.99

Per paid ticket

payment processing: **2.9% + $0.30**

##### Custom

Thinking big? Let's talk.

[Contact us](https://humanitix.com/us/contact-us/new-organiser-enquiry)

All good, no compromise.
------------------------

*   **ALL** plans get access to **ALL** features.
*   **NO** sign up fees, **NO** contracts.
*   **FREE** customer support.
*   **ALL** profits go to charity.

Enjoy robust features with any plan
-----------------------------------

*   Human support
*   Sell on your website
*   Beautiful design customisation
*   Unlimited ticket types
*   Mailchimp integration
*   Scanning app
*   Salesforce integration
*   Facebook integration
*   Email campaigns
*   Bulk upload of guests
*   Rich reporting
*   Canva integration
*   Accessibility tools
*   Reserved seating
*   Sell merchandise
*   Scheduled payouts
*   Gift cards
*   Tour pages
*   Invoicing
*   Resell tickets with Tixel
*   Private virtual events
*   Live analytics
*   Waitlist
*   Team permissions sharing
*   Promotion tools
*   Complex ticketing
*   Templates
*   Custom fees structure
*   Checkout questions
*   Discount and access codes

#### Looking for more?

[Explore all features](https://humanitix.com/us/features)

Join us on our mission to put humanity first and turn booking fees into a force for good.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Humanitix offers a free tier for free events and usage-based pricing for paid tickets. Custom pricing is available for large-scale events.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For events that are free to attend.
Discounted pricing for charities and schools.
